description: Dilma Rousseff, Brazil’s suspended president, testified at her impeachment trial in the Senate in Brasília on Monday, saying, "Don't expect me to stay silent like a coward."
title: Rousseff Testifies in Impeachment Trial
title_page: Rousseff Testifies in Impeachment Trial - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Dilma Rousseff, Brazil’s suspended president, testified at her impeachment trial in the Senate in Brasília on Monday, saying, "Don't expect me to stay silent like a coward."
